title: Generation in Ltd office set up to empower youth
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 19 (APP):Chairman of the Prime Minister Youth Programme (PMYP) Rana Mashhood Ahmed Khan on Friday said that Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif approved the establishment of the international multi-sector partnership program Generation in Limited office in Pakistan.
In a statement, Mashhood said that the Prime Minister would be the Patron-in-Chief of the Council while the Chairman of the PMYP will act as Chairperson and Convener.
He said that setting up the Generation In Limited office is another step towards youth empowerment.
The Chairman PMYP added that 41 members would be part of the Generation In Ltd Advisory and Technical Steer Council while 17 federal and provincial ministers are included in the Strategic Advisory Committee.
This initiative is an important step towards youth empowerment and promoting sustainable development, he said and added that Generation In Limited will work under the Public Private Youth Partnership and will provide more development opportunities to Pakistani youth.
